TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi StartupNextInstanceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後續的執行個體的單一執行個體的應用程式啟動時，使用 Visual Basic 應用程式模型，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 包含命令列引數，後續的應用程式執行個體，並指出第一個應用程式執行個體是否應移到結束的例外狀況處理常式時前景。 contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<string> args, bool bringToForegroundFlag) cil managed
Public Sub New (args As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String), bringToForegroundFlag As Boolean)

param.name: args
param.span: 物件，包含後續應用程式執行個體的命令列引數。

span.span: A object that contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

param.name: bringToForegroundFlag
param.span: ，指出是否應在結束例外狀況處理常式時，將第一個應用程式執行個體置於前景。

span.span: A that indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後續的執行個體的單一執行個體的應用程式啟動時，使用 Visual Basic 應用程式模型，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 包含命令列引數，後續的應用程式執行個體，並指出第一個應用程式執行個體是否應移到結束的例外狀況處理常式時前景。 contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance and indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BringToForeground { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出是否應在結束例外狀況處理常式時，將第一個應用程式執行個體置於前景。

span.span: Indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

value.span: ，指出是否應在結束例外狀況處理常式時，將第一個應用程式執行個體置於前景。

span.span: A that indicates whether the first application instance should be brought to the foreground upon exiting the exception handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 應用程式模型之後執行的處理常式中檢查這個屬性的值事件。The Visual Basic Application Model checks the value of this property after running the handlers of the event. 如果屬性是`True`，第一個應用程式執行個體被帶到前景。If the property is `True`, the first application instance is brought to the foreground. 否則，第一個應用程式執行個體仍會留地方。Otherwise, the first application instance remains where it was. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandLine As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 取得後續應用程式執行個體的命令列引數。

span.span: Gets the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

value.span: 物件，包含後續應用程式執行個體的命令列引數。

span.span: A object that contains the command-line arguments of the subsequent application instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後續的執行個體的單一執行個體的應用程式啟動時，使用 Visual Basic 應用程式模型，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application starts, using the Visual Basic Application Model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
